backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing file, folder, mission, and user‑profile management with access control, storage mixins, and diagnostic/health queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two splash‑screen related features to their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the functionality and purpose of key frontend React components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing a v114 frontend baseline, detailing verification steps, parity checks, and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Defines the base HTML document with PWA meta tags, icons, and mounts the app entrypoint.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice stating no frontend modifications are permitted post‑restoration until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring app metadata, theme colors, startup behavior, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a service worker with minimal precaching, network-first fetch strategy, and runtime caching.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming the frontend was restored to match Live v114, covering authentication, components, styling, and behavior validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing theme, providers, authentication state, and an intro screen flow.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Renders a detailed error UI for failed actor initialization with retry, logout, and expandable technical info.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Displays an animated SVG target-style icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom line for UI styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot open externally, offering retry or download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Modal for previewing files with support for images, video, PDFs, Office docs, and actions like download, delete, send to folder, and move to mission.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: UI for uploading files or adding links, handling progress, validation, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders dialog when clicked.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, selecting, and deleting folders with swipe actions and backend integration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with navigation, swipe support, file operations, and external open/download handling.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Gallery listing files with icons, previews, long-press selection mode, bulk actions, and integration with the full-screen viewer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top app header with theme toggle, auth icon menu, app title, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays an animated splash screen that plays once and then triggers completion.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Shows a dialog when external links fail to open, offering retry or copy options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a button to trigger Internet Identity login with loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor displaying mission data, tasks, file previews, and save/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title input and task management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full‑screen view listing missions with create, delete, selection, and swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper enforcing a mobile-only layout container for its children.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for selecting a mission and moving selected file IDs into it, with loading states and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files into folders or back to the main collection, showing available folders and handling mutations.
Swipeable row component enabling edit/delete actions using pointer events with gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar displaying total progress and item count from the upload context.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding graphics and messaging, prompting users to log in.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization, retries, error states, and authentication linkage.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context tracking upload batches, progress, and helper methods for starting, updating, and completing uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via react-query, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context with login, logout, status management, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer (touch) and updates on pointer type changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks to list, fetch, create, and update missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future notes-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders, including pagination and folder management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme tokens, layout rules, and custom design variables.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helper merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client provider, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main UI page handling authentication state, data fetching, smoke tests, and folder/mission UI flows.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized messages and helper functions to classify and serialize actor initialization and canister-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities to open external URLs with popup-block detection and to download files via blob links.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, deciding between in-app viewing, office preview, or direct download.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides helpers to determine previewability and user-facing type labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Offers diagnostics for React Query mission caches and logs delete mutation lifecycle events.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a backend smoke test covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and verification via list APIs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list enumerating all frontend files included in the Live v114 baseline for drift detection.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, listing splash screen update requirements and pending fixes for uploads, folders, missions, and post-login splash behavior. Stores feature metadata, versions, and project configuration.
